name: Fishing in the woods
description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗹𝘀: 

~𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲 - launch a hook 

~𝗔𝗿𝗿𝗼𝘄𝘀 - play in quick time event

𝗔𝗯𝗼𝘂𝘁 𝗴𝗮𝗺𝗲:

In the game you really have to go fishing in the woods. You will go farther and farther into the forest, meeting new animals and increasing your catch. The only thing that might get in your way is a broken fishing line.

𝗣𝗹𝗼𝘁:

The main character’s settlement is boring, all elves are like elves. And elves-hunters, too, go hunting with their bows. He, as a young rebel, is extremely unhappy with this. He made a fishing rod out of his bow, ignoring the taunts from the stuck-up elves, he goes fishing for animals in the woods. It is up to you to see if he can realize his rebellion.
